recommendations.description:
Through this course, students will expand their German language skills to intermediate level 1 (B1.1 according to the European Language Standards) with the help of a native speaker. In addition to class, students will be able to participate in an online exchange program with German students to further help them improve their abilities and practice intercultural communication skills.
The main focus of this class is to help students go from beginner level towards intermediate level, helping students to use German more independently, autonomously and confidently.
In B1-level (Advanced German Conversation 1 and 2), students will complete the foundational grammar and expand their vocabulary, both content wise as well as in the variety of the topics. They learn to express their opinion, how to talk about familiar topics and personal interests in a more coherent way and can share about experiences, dreams, hopes, goals and plans, learning to give reasons or short explanations. Writing and reading tasks give students the opportunity to learn diverse letter and texts types, going beyond everyday topics and more suitable for more professional settings (e.g. articles, statistics, interviews, emails at work or interacting with companies).
Special focus of this class is on speaking, while also improving reading, writing and listening. Students will gain more confidence in speaking and communicating in German and also learn strategies how to study and improve their language learning outside of the classroom. In addition to the course book, we will also work with authentic German resources and learn strategies how to use these to grow to intermediate level.

recommendations.name: 고급독일어회화 2
recommendations.description:
Through this course, students will expand their German language skills to intermediate level 2 (B1.2
according to the European Language Standards) with the help of a native speaker. Each student will
also be paired with a student from Germany for language exchange (Tandem). This will give students
further opportunities to practice and improve their language skills as well as learn more about German
culture(s), using language in authentic communication.
The main focus of this class is to help students go from early intermediate towards confident
intermediate level, helping students to use German more independently, autonomously and
confidently.
In B1-level (Advanced German Conversation 1 and 2), students will complete the foundational
grammar and expand their vocabulary, both content wise as well as in the variety of the topics. They
learn to express their opinion, how to talk about familiar topics and personal interests in a more
coherent way and can share about experiences, dreams, hopes, goals and plans, learning to give
reasons or short explanations. Writing and reading tasks give students the opportunity to learn diverse
letter and texts types, going beyond everyday topics and more suitable for more professional settings
(e.g. articles, statistics, interviews, emails at work or interacting with companies).
Special focus of this class is on speaking, while also improving reading, writing and listening. Students
will gain more confidence in speaking and communicating in German and also learn strategies on how
to study and improve their language learning outside of the classroom. In addition to the course book,
we will also work with authentic German resources and learn strategies on how to use these to grow
to intermediate level.
Students have to buy the books in advance. Please keep in mind that it takes time to get the
original German books.
